Title: Toxic Evolution
Creator: Alvaro Soler-Arpa
Material: Different animal bones, wire and plastic waste

Title: Creatives Against #CAA
Creator: Kadak Collective
Description: An online archive containing various creative and informational material, including printable files,protest posters, zines, images, and  infographics explaining the Citizenship (Amendment) Act, 2019 (CAA) and the National Register of Citizens (NRC).The CAA act along with NRC was critiqued as an attempt to deny citizenship based on religion and disenfranchise Indian Muslims.

Title: Anti-CAA Murals
Creator: Simeen Anjum
Description: Simeen Anjum, a fine art student at Jamia Millia Islamia and other artists came to represent the artistic expression of political dissent through the creation of murals and graffiti in public spaces. The anti-CAA and NRC movement mobilized the public at the grassroots level and art functioned as a powerful tool for resistance.
